author: Nancy A. Youssef
title: U.S., U.K. and France Launch Strikes Against Syria - WSJ
text:
U.S., U.K. and French forces launched airstrikes targeting sites associated with Syriaâ€™s chemical-weapons capabilities, a reprisal for an attack last week that killed at least 43 civilians and injured hundreds more.
The decision to strike was aimed at cutting off the production and use of chemical weapons in the country, President Donald Trump said at the White House on Friday night.
